scripts.clean-up: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-*  && npm cache clean --force &&  rm -rf node_modules/ &&  yarn
scripts.clean-up-light: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-*  && npm cache clean --force
scripts.bundle:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.bundle:androidDebug: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
